steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid testaccepta6128 and test12 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
I click on 'Sim only Tariff' tab
verify that the url has simo at the end
the 'Phones' button should be selected by default
click on the 'Tablets' button
the two contract lenght should be displayed
all the tariffs under twelve months should be displayed
if Configured is configured then display the banner
verify that 'Why choose an O2 Pay Monthly sim' is not displayed in upgrade options page
the data filters is displayed
I click on respective <filterSort> data filter
Data filter button should be in 'selected' state
I should see appropriate tariffs based on the selected data filter <Tariffsortoption>
the 'sorting dropdown' is displayed just below the toggle buttons sections
verify that the upfront sort options is not present in the 'sorting dropdown'
I should see data filters buttons next to existing sort drop-down for PAYM/SIMO tariffs Monthly data (Low to High)
If I select ANY sort option Monthly data (Low to High) from the drop-down
I should see tariffs relevant to selected sort option Monthly data (Low to High) & filter option high
I deselect filter button
I should see tariffs based on the selected sort option Monthly data (Low to High)
Click on different 12 Months  Months Tariff in Tab
Click on 'Select' CTA to buy a tariff
copy text SIM delivery required or not is displayed

name: CFU_TabletsSimo12months
description: This scenario ensures that an upgrade customer is able to select a 12 months tablets tariff under the simo tab in upgrade options page
